title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height is not updated immediately after changing the font size in the UI.
EB: The label content and height should be adjusted accordingly when the font size is modified.
SR:
1. Open the UI where the label is displayed.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Verify that the label content and height are adjusted correctly based on the new font size.
